recipes: This one must serve another purpose now. Into the cupboard they go.
I've locked this one away safely. When their screaming and raving subsides, I will subdue them properly.
Add Passion to accept, or Reason to interrogate Poppy further.

'My dear, I've been wanting to talk to you. Sometimes, I fund scholars of the invisible arts. I'd like to offer you my support. A substantial contribution. And all you need to do, some day, is to introduce me to someone else who'll end matters properly.' She smiles, benignly. [Add Passion to accept, or Reason to interrogate her further.]
I didn't take up Poppy's offer.
'Yes, that's exactly right. I'll come back tonight.'
A tiny packet of tiny treasures: a gift from Poppy. She'll see me again in the Season of Rags, for me to make the introduction I promised.

'Yes. When the Season of Rags comes round again, my sponsor will require someone for an ending. You can provide someone sufficiently loyal, or you can provide yourself. As you prefer. I don't want to be any trouble.'
In the 'Season of Rags', Poppy will return...
Poppy is seen around town, assisting at charitable events, smiling benignly.
'This is the time, my dear. The Sun-in-Rags requires his conclusion. Will it be you? Or do you have a friend?'
'What a loyal friend you have here! Do say goodbye, now.'
My follower is gone. I remain. Poppy Lascelles is seen, here and there, but she is not currently accepting callers.
